body: Mike writes: "On February 7, 1982, the Guerrilla Army of the Poor (EGP), the Rebel Armed Forces (FAR), the Organization of the People in Arms (ORPA), and the Guatemalan Labor Party (PGT) formed the Guatemalan National Revolutionary Unit (URNG)." He goes on to write about the URNG's history, including the party's significance today.

He goes on to write about the URNG's history, including the party's significance today.
title: Guatemala: 19th Anniversary of the Guatemalan National Revolutionary Unit (URNG)
